mcq.statement: An ionic compound is most likely to be formed when ______?

options.a: Ionization energy of A is high but electron affinity of B is low
options.b: The ionization energy of A is low but electron affinity of B is high
options.c: Both ionization energy of A and electron affinity of B are high
options.d: Both ionization energy of A and electron affinity of B are low
